:::{#hero-heading}

Hi, I am Qi Zhang, an assistant professor at WPI.
I work on building collaborative AI agents. My research interests are in formalisms, theories, and algorithms of single- and multi-agent planning and reinforcement learning.

2025 - Now  &nbsp;&nbsp; Assistant Professor, CS/AI @ WPI <br>
2020 - 2025  &nbsp;&nbsp; Assistant Professor, CSE/AI @ U of South Carolina <br>
2015 - 2020  &nbsp;&nbsp; PhD, CSE @ UMich

Email: qzhang9 at wpi.edu <br>
Office: Unity Hall 355

**
I am looking for PhD students and visiting researchers!
**
:::
